name: The Last Mandolorian
description:
The Last Mandolorian is a wave based shooter influenced by the Star Wars Films. It was created for a 2 day game jam. 

Designers

Jed Camilleri

Phillip Pajor 

Cody Camn 

Artists

Adam Douglas 

Troy Russell Cook 

Programmer

Eric Vulgar 

All Rights of music go to their rightful owners. This project is a non profit game and is intended for entertainment only.
